    Welcome

    To my blog! Here you will find fine selections of puggo photos - some with special guest Ponyo pug!

    Visit my website BoboPug.com

    Photo credit: [Alexis]

    Hi my name is Bobo pug! I'm a Cali girl who loves long walks on the beach and soy chai lattes. Catch me at the dog beach peeing on seaweed or taking in the cool breeze.
